title: US Treasury Secretary Says He’s Not Pushing Fed Cuts, Just Touting Models
summary: The Fed last month kept its target range for the benchmark rate at 4.25% to 4.5%. The median estimate of the neutral rate among Fed officials over the long run is 3%.
fullContent: The Fed last month kept its target range for the benchmark rate at 4.25% to 4.5%. The median estimate of the neutral rate among Fed officials over the long run is 3%.

title: Tokyo Plast International Limited
summary: The Exchange had sought clarification from Tokyo Plast International Limited for the quarter ended 31-Mar-2025 with respect to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
fullContent: The Exchange had sought clarification from Tokyo Plast International Limited for the quarter ended 31-Mar-2025 with respect to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. On basis of above the Company was required to clarify the following: -1. Financial results submitted is not as per format prescribed by SEBI -2. Limited Review Report/ Independent Auditor's Report is not in the format prescribed by SEBI The response of the Company is enclosed. |SUBJECT: Reply to Clarification- Financial results
